title: Headshot (Part 3)
body:
Headshot (Part 3)

A shadow bullet was spinning around Evan at a rapid speed.

He was still standing behind the tree looking at Leon and the wolf with a focused gaze.

Although he was 200 meters away from them and it was nighttime, he was still able to see them without any problem.

Now that his prime core advanced to D+ rank he found it easier to control the bullet.

Even though he was feeling a slight headache, it was very low compared to the last time.

Moreover, his control over the bullet was also better than before.

The bullet spun around him as its speed continue to increase.

When Evan saw fifty meters big magic circle he was stunned for a moment and thought Leon was going to do something big.

But when he saw how the wolf easily blocked the rain of the ambers he once again put his focus on the bullet.

His target was Leon who backed away after using amber rain.
